news_items.title: Combined Authority Mayoral election
news_items.description: The Hull and East Yorkshire Combined Authority (HEYCA) has congratulated Luke Campbell on his election as the region’s first mayor.

news_items.title: International Choir Competition lands back in Hull
news_items.description: Hull’s International Choir Competition returns on Friday 2 May, bringing over 1000 singers from across the globe to the city.

news_items.title: How often do you feel lonely or isolated?
news_items.description: The Imperial College London are investigating social isolation and loneliness in the population. You can take part by completing the brief survey.

news_items.title: The People's Panel - Have your say
news_items.description: Tell us what you think about things that affect you, your family, your neighbourhood and the local area, and be entered into a prize draw to win up to £250 in high street shopping vouchers.
